channel.title: Met Éireann Warnings
channel.description: Warnings issued by Met Éireann. This RSS feed displays valid warnings for land areas only. Sea area warnings will be added at a later date. Clicking the links, loads the CAP (Common Alerting Protocol) XML file. Note: Moderate means ‘Status Yellow’, Severe means ‘Status Orange’ and extreme means ‘Status Red’

item.title: Blight Advisory for Ireland
item.description: A potato blight advisory is in effect. For details please see the Farming Commentary under the Forecasts tab.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Carlingford Lough to Roche's Point to Rossan Point
item.description: Southeast winds veering southwest will reach force 6 at times
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Gale warning from Roche's Point to Mizen Head to Loop Head
item.description: Southwest winds veering northwest will reach gale force 8 at times
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning for all coasts of Ireland
item.description: Cyclonic variable winds becoming mainly northerly by noon on Wednesday will reach force 6 or higher at times
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)

item.title: Small Craft warning from Mizen Head to Erris Head to Belfast Lough
item.description: North to northwest winds will reach force 6 or higher at times.
item.author: forecasts@met.ie (Met Éireann)
